name: Kitchen in Southeast (Favorable)
description: Southeast is governed by Agni (fire), making it the ideal place for the kitchen, enhancing health and well-being.

consequence.message: Kitchen in Southeast enhances digestive fire and health.

name: Kitchen in Northwest (Moderately Favorable)
description: A kitchen in the Northwest is acceptable, particularly when Southeast is unavailable, but it may lead to inconsistent food habits.

consequence.message: Kitchen in Northwest is permissible but may cause instability in domestic routines.

remedy.description: Use light yellow or white tones; maintain kitchen hygiene strictly.

name: Master Bedroom in Southwest (Favorable)
description: The southwest direction signifies strength and stability, making it ideal for the master bedroom to ensure authority and harmony.

consequence.message: Master bedroom in the Southwest provides authority and stability in relationships.

name: Master Bedroom in Northeast (Vastu Defect)
description: The northeast is a zone of purity and spirituality, unsuitable for heavy functions like the master bedroom, which may disturb mental peace and cause instability.

consequence.message: Master bedroom in the Northeast may lead to stress and weak decision-making.

remedy.description: Use pastel colors and place a Vastu pyramid in the room’s southwest corner.

name: Stove Facing South (Vastu Defect)
description: Cooking while facing south is inauspicious in Vastu, as it may lead to increased anger and health issues.

consequence.message: Cooking while facing south may increase stress and aggression in the household.

remedy.description: Shift stove orientation to East if possible. Place lemon and copper vessel nearby.

name: Mirror on North Wall (Favorable)
description: Mirrors on the north wall enhance financial energies as North is ruled by Kuber, the god of wealth.

consequence.message: Mirror on north wall promotes prosperity and good energy flow.

name: Entrance Facing East (Highly Favorable)
description: East is the direction of the rising sun and Surya, symbolizing energy, vitality, and new opportunities. An entrance here brings growth and fame.

consequence.message: East-facing entrance enhances vitality, recognition, and success.

name: Entrance Facing Southwest (Severe Vastu Defect)
description: The Southwest is ruled by the earth element and represents stability. An entrance here destabilizes energy, leading to financial and relationship troubles.

consequence.message: Entrance in Southwest leads to chronic problems, losses, and instability.

remedy.description: Place a lead square near the entrance and install Vastu metal strips in the doorframe.

name: Sleeping with Head Towards South (Favorable)
description: Sleeping with the head towards South aligns the body’s magnetic field with the Earth’s, improving rest, immunity, and stability.

consequence.message: Sleeping with head to South promotes deep sleep and long-term health.

name: Cooking While Facing East (Favorable)
description: Cooking while facing East aligns with the fire element’s direction, enhancing digestion and health benefits.

consequence.message: Cooking facing East promotes positive energy in food and family well-being.

name: Water Source in Northeast (Highly Favorable)
description: The Northeast is ideal for wells, water tanks, and underground water sources, enhancing clarity, intuition, and prosperity.

consequence.message: Northeast water brings blessings, clarity, and wealth.

name: Large Tree in Northeast (Vastu Defect)
description: Heavy trees in the Northeast block spiritual and positive energy inflow, leading to confusion and loss of clarity.

consequence.message: Trees in Northeast block divine energy, causing mental instability.

remedy.description: Trim/remove tree, place a white stone or quartz in the Northeast.

name: Central Zone (Brahmasthan) Must Be Open
description: The Brahmasthan (central zone) of a house must remain free of walls, toilets, beams, or heavy furniture to allow energy circulation.

consequence.message: Obstruction in Brahmasthan restricts prana flow and harmony.

remedy.description: Remove clutter; place a Vastu pyramid or install a skylight to energize.

name: No Staircase in Northeast
description: The Northeast must remain light and open. A staircase here blocks upward spiritual and mental growth.

consequence.message: Staircase in NE causes mental blocks, legal issues, and confusion.

remedy.description: Use Vastu crystals and white lighting; keep the zone clutter-free.

name: Overhead Water Tank in Southwest (Favorable)
description: Southwest is the best zone for heavy overhead tanks, ensuring energy stability and balance.

consequence.message: Tank in SW balances fire and earth, promoting success.

name: Garage in Northwest (Favorable)
description: Vehicles represent mobility; placing a garage in Northwest supports movement and timely opportunities.

consequence.message: NW garage ensures smooth transitions and journeys.
